channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pavement collapsed, 24th November
item.description:
The tarmac on the pavement has collapsed inwards. An uneven - jagged surface that is a dangerous trip hazard, especially as it’s just along from the bus stop.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Hatherley Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 24th November
item.description:
Can I report this street light which is almost completely obscured by foliage on what is a busy road with a narrow pavement on one side of the road only, thanks. Photos added
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Restaurant waste spilling onto pavement, 24th November
item.description:
New street near junction of Ambrose Street. Piles of waste from restaurant spilling onto pavement so that it is wholly obstructed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, New Street, St Paul’s, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 24th November
item.description:
FMS Report has been made to Gloucestershire Police (incident 264 20-11-2023) - a male has driven into the pedestrian crossing signal. Please see attached photo. Please advise how you wish to proceed with this report and whether you are wishing to proceed with a formal Police investigation into this matter. If you can update soonest via 101 if you wish to proceed with any complaint. Our log will be closed pending any further contact from yourselves. Many Thanks
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Road closed sign left on pavement, 24th November
item.description:
The road was closed for roadworks several months ago, and there's still a road closed sign left behind. It keeps being moved by students and messed around with. But ultimately, it's now just 'rubbish' that's blocking the view round the corner when driving.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 159, Brunswick Street, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gate is damaged/missing/locked problem, 24th November
item.description:
email rec 22/11/2023 Please see attached a map of the footpaths near to Whittington Court, GL54 4HF. We are re-fencing a section near to the footpath and would like to add a new kissing gate (site marked with a purple cross) where the footpath crosses the new stock fence. Do you supply these gates?
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in pavement problem, 24th November
item.description:
Uneven ground.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose/rattling cover/ironwork problem, 24th November
item.description:
Request for drainage survey.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 24th November
item.description:
I'm hoping to place a charity banner on railings in Cheltenham and understand I need to seek your permission. The attachment includes all the details and I hope this is the right route to seek that agreement. This is my first time seeking permission for such a banner so any advice would be welcomed.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The sign is illegible problem, 24th November
item.description:
email rec 17/11/2023 - At this junction, there used to be a signpost as shown below. This image is from 2011 (attached); it was gone by the next image taken in 2021. If it is gone or damaged, can it be replaced, please? I suppose that it could been knocked over but I haven’t seen it and nobody has reported it as such.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 24th November
item.description:
23/11/23 email rcvd, relevant section below - The pothole is in Cleevelands Drive, just past Cleevelands Avenue when entering the estate. It is very deep. There is also a pothole before this one which has been reported but which is growing in size.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The sign is illegible problem, 24th November
item.description:
The signs pointing to Up Hatherley and Warden Hill sited opposite Woodlands Road junction with Shurdington Road are completely hidden by vegetation. Please could this be added to the "vegetation cut back" list?
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 24th November
item.description:
Pothole - 6 inches deep and 2 foot long and a foot wide. Customer is concerned that this is a hazard for cyclists using this road.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 24th November
item.description:
Traffic light bent out of shape. Reported via mobile anonymously at 10:08, Wednesday using FixMyStreet Pro Sent to Cheltenham Borough Council less than a minute later. FixMyStreet ref: 5240511. Crossroad between 88 Portland St, Cheltenham GL52 2PE and Clarence Rd, Cheltenham GL52 2AU.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles
